summary.body: Live in nanny wanted to look after three youngsters in north London for professional couple (doctors). References required. Any recommendations gratefully received.
summary.subject: Nanny wanted urgently

summary.body: Hi everyone, firstly thank you  for all your kind words and advice on redecorating my appartment  I'm having to put those plans on hold for the time being though. On another note, can anyone recommend the best place to advertise for  a live-in house keeper?
summary.subject: Housekeeper
